text.author: Santa Barbara Corpus of Spoken American English (ed. John W. Du Bois)
text.title: Swingin' Kid
text.summary: After cleaning up Coke cans, Steven talks with his mom, who is making pizza for some guests but has a headache, about ideas for a present for Robbie's birthday, such as a Yack Pack tape recorder from Toys 'R' Us, as well as some things he would like for Christmas himself, including movies and a Ouija board.
